title: What fully automated companies will look like

metadata.summary: The episode discusses the potential of fully automated companies, examining how Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) will enable firms to replicate AI workers, bypassing traditional hiring bottlenecks. It envisions a future where "Mega Steve"-like AI systems, processing vast amounts of data, will outperform human CEOs. The discussion highlights how AI could revolutionize social organization, similar to the shift from hunter-gatherer societies to modern corporations. The episode also explores the massive scale of AI firms compared to current human-led companies and the profound differences in evolvability between AI and human-led organizations.

topClaims.text: AGI will enable firms to replicate their AI workers millions of times, fundamentally transforming workforce dynamics.
Mega Steve will process data from every customer conversation, engineering decision, and market response, outperforming any human CEO.
AI will change social organization as significantly as the transition from hunter-gatherer tribes to modern corporations.
AI firms will have population sizes that are orders of magnitude larger than today's biggest companies.
The scale of difference between currently existing human firms and fully automated firms will be like the gulf in complexity between prokaryotes and eukaryotes.

topQuotes.text: You can just turn capital into compute and compute into labor.
Think about how limited a CEO's knowledge is today.
Merging will be a step change in how organizations can accumulate and apply knowledge.
Every bit of tacit knowledge from millions of copies gets perfectly preserved, shared, and given due consideration.
AI corporations will be more software-like, with perfect replication of successful subdivisions and faster feedback loops.

localized.description:
Based on my essay about AI firms and automation: https://www.dwarkesh.com/ai-firm.

For future essays and episodes, subscribe at https://www.dwarkesh.com/.

Thanks to Google for sponsoring. We used their Veo 2 model to make this entire video—it generated everything from the photorealistic humans to the claymation octopuses. If you’re a Gemini Advanced user, you can try Veo 2 now in the Gemini app. Just select Veo 2 in the dropdown, and type your video idea in the prompt bar. Get started today by going to gemini.google.com.

To sponsor a future episode, visit dwarkesh.com/advertise.

metadata.shortSummary: This episode explores the future of fully automated companies, predicting how AI will transform workforce dynamics, social organization, and the scale of businesses.
